divs: sighting detailsstanding on my front porch, waiting for 1\2 time to be finished during steelers game, i saw, in the eastern sky a bright orange, star like light. this, two nights after seeing 4 of the same, a little further south. i watched this light for about 3 minutes. i stepped back into the house to see if the game was back on. i turned back to look out the front door, and it was gone. a minute later, an airplane was flying from east to west, appeared to be much higher altitude than the orange, stationary light i observed. i can't help but feel like this sighting was\is related to the one around the same time of the evening two nights earlier
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rives Junction
There was one other sighting in Rives Junction on or around September 16th 2013
Summary: Observed a Bright Orange, Star Like Light. Hovered in the Eastern Sky, then Vanished
